Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: A cliff overhangs the road, providing a relief from the cold wind.
Room.LongDescription: A narrow crevice in the cliffside looks pretty deep, but you might be able to squeeze in there, if you want to get out of the inclement weather. A draft of warm air from the opening creates a fog around this part of the road, but it seems to be for only a few meters on either side.
